name: The Central Station Memphis, Curio Collection By Hilton
description:
Conveniently set in the center of Memphis, The Central Station Memphis, Curio Collection By Hilton provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness center, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property has nightclub and an ATM.
At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk. Guest rooms include a closet.
An à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at the property. At The Central Station Memphis, Curio Collection By Hilton you'll find a restaurant serving American, French and Local cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested.
The accommodation has a sun terrace. Guests at The Central Station Memphis, Curio Collection By Hilton will be able to enjoy activities in and around Memphis, like cycling.
A business center and vending machines with drinks are available on site at the hotel.
Popular points of interest near The Central Station Memphis, Curio Collection By Hilton include Orpheum Theater, Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum and FedExForum. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 10 miles from the accommodation.
breakfast: Continental, Full English/Irish, Vegetarian, Vegan, Gluten-free, American

name: Motel 6-Memphis, TN - Downtown
description:
Located off of Interstate 240 in Central Memphis, this hotel is 10 minutes’ drive from Graceland. Free WiFi and cable TV in all rooms.
A work desk is available in each simply decorated guest room of the Motel 6 Memphis Downtown.
Vending machines for snacks and drinks are on site at this Memphis hotel. Guests will also have access to fax and photocopying facilities.
Beale Street is less than 2 miles from the Memphis Downtown Motel 6. This hotel is also 5 minutes’ drive from the National Civil Rights Museum.

userReviews.title: OKAY If YOU DON'T MIND...
userReviews.positive:
Hot Water in the Bathroom
Clean Bed Linens
Operable Television after I asked for new Batteries
Room Door locked without a lot of effort.
Office Staff are very professional.
Lots of Lights in the Room.
userReviews.negative:
For the first three Days, I did not notice anything because I was just leaving the Hospital and was in a lot of Pain and on a lot of Meds.
When my senses woke up, It hit me that the Grounds are neat, but disgustingly smelly and filthy.
THE ROOM:
Floor was sticky and and filthy; the A.C. has a 20 year Old Cigarette/Dirty Socks stink and build up dust inside the Vent, and possibly the Filter as well. This smell was so bad it coated my throat, tongue and nose with a bitter taste, burned my eyes, and made me feel dirty after taking a Shower.
The Curtain was soiled, had Holes and one side of it hung down to partially expose the Room's Interior. One Hole was large enough that I had to stuff  a piece of Paper Bag through it to prevent Peeping Toms. I had to relocate a Hook in the Curtain to attach it to the side of the Traverse Rod Fixture to secure my privacy.
The Ceiling was unfinished by the Window where there might have been a Light Fixture.
THE WALLS: are filthy with protruding Nails.
THE SINK AREA:
Peeled Wall Paper, no Hot Water, the Faucet moves around, the Towel Rack soiled with dust.
THE BED:
I did not examine the Mattress, but it was comfortable and the Linen seems very clean.
Flies perching on my Bed and Towels; so unsanitary.
THE BATHROOM:
There is an inoperable Exhaust Fan that seems to be out of commission also for 20years. This is probably where the five Flies came from; I killed four of them.
Towel Rack is soiled with dust.
The Step Towel was either stained or dirty.
The Faucet is loose and seems fragile.
THE PROPERTY:
Extremely filthy and smelly.
Grounds Staff not friendly, you have to make a request many times before they understand.
It doesn't take much to deep clean once per Week.
Rooms should look and smell clean and fresh.
The Grounds should be hosed down with Bleach or some disinfection.
Outside fixtures and Elevators should be sanitised.

name: ARRIVE Memphis
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at ARRIVE Memphis! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Located in Memphis and with Orpheum Theater reachable within a 10-minute walk, ARRIVE Memphis provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Private parking is available on site.
Guest rooms include a private bathroom, bathrobes and bed linen.
Popular points of interest near the hotel include Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum, FedExForum and AutoZone Park. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 10 miles from ARRIVE Memphis.

name: River Inn of Harbor Town
description:
This Tennessee boutique hotel overlooks the Mississippi River 5 minutes' drive from Memphis. Guests will be greeted with a glass of champagne at check-in and can enjoy a daily breakfast at one of the 3 restaurants.
Each room at the River Inn features European décor with a four-poster bed, 40-inch flat-screen TV, and refrigerator. Extras include a desk, and many of the elegant rooms also offer a river view.
Guests of the Harbor Town River Inn can find gourmet food at Paullette's Restaurant and continental cuisine at Tugs Neighborhood Grill. Food and drinks can be enjoyed at Terrace on the rooftop with panoramic views.
River Inn of Harbor Town features free Wi-Fi and 24-hour concierge services. A gym is on site for added convenience.
The Orpheum Theater and Memphis Cook Convention Center are a 5-minute drive from this Harbor River Inn. The Memphis Zoo and Pyramid Arena are 10 minutes away.

address.full: 50 Harbor Town Square, Memphis, TN 38103, United States of America

userReviews.positive: I liked the idea of a full breakfast menu included. The breakfast was very restrictive and did not offer vegan protein options, as a lot of progressive restaurants currently offer. For the price, I hoped they would offer substitutes and I called ahead to plan. They do not currently have vegan/vegetarian meat subs, so we did not get the value of breakfast included as would meat eaters (traditional bacon and sausage only). For the price and considering the quaintness of the hotel, I honestly expected an accommodation. Overall, the location is great and the quaintness won us over. We had massages just steps away from the lobby at Harbor Town Spa and the price and services were excellent.
userReviews.negative: The housekeeping needed more attention to detail. We found several long strands of hair in the tub and in several places on the bathroom floor. The curtains had what appeared to be stains on them and there were paint patches on the walls. For the cost, I would have expected they inspect the rooms closer and replace and repair items so they are not noticed by guests. The thermostat wasn't properly functioning, and we were either too hot or too cold. The property itself is very nice, but some updating of the menu and more attention to the details in the rooms would have gotten a higher rating.

EVERYONE was smiling and kind, everyone.  From desk staff to maintenance, to our housekeepers - the best way to wakeup is with a smile and morning hello fro the greatest staff.

userReviews.negative: What was not to like?

userReviews.title: Loved it. Would go back the next time I am in Memphis.
userReviews.positive: I loved the location. And the room was amazing. We had views of the River from every room in our suite. They brought us port wine and chocolates every evening. It was very nice. And they had good bath products. The shampoo, conditioner, soap, and shower gels were great. I have long hair and I always need extra shampoo and conditioner. Sometimes hotels don’t want to give me an extra shampoo and conditioner but they were very nice about it  and they even brought it up to room which I appreciated. We also wanted a Diet Coke at one point. The hotel does not have vending machines so I called the Terrace restaurant and they came right over and delivered Diet Cokes to our room and they even brought us a refill which we did not ask for but it was nice that they did that anyway. The lady at the front desk was very nice.  All of the cleaning staff where nice. All around just very nice people that anticipated our needs and did a great job.
userReviews.negative:
My stay included breakfast every morning; however, the restaurants at the hotel changed the menus for Easter.   I was not allowed to get regular breakfast food. Instead they were offering an abbreviated  menu that did not include regular breakfast food (eggs, bacon, toast) and we were told no exceptions to the Easter menu.  There was only one thing I could eat that was being offered and that was an appetizer for breakfast.  I would have gone somewhere else for breakfast but we couldn’t find anything that was open that did not need prior reservations because of the holiday. Not the end of the world but it was annoying since I took the holiday into consideration when I was planning the trip so that I could ensure we were able to eat somewhere that day. 
Also, I have very bad allergies to down and asked in my booking request that there be no down pillows and bedding in the room. When we arrived, my husband always does a sweep of the room to check for down before I come in the room.  Sure enough, three of the 6 pillows had down in them. He was able to remove the pillows and put them in a closet before I came in the room. The pillows did not touch my side of the bed so I was able to lay in the sheets without having to change them and  I did not have an allergy attack. I would just suggest though that they make sure to pay special attention to allergy accommodation requests because allergies are no joke and can actually kill someone. I do carry an epipen for severe allergy attacks. To present date, I have never had to use the epipen for down reactions; however I do have several allergies that I  have had to use it for.  But hives, itching, swelling, watery eyes, and nasal symptoms are my normal reaction to down and that would not have been fun to experience on the trip and thankfully that did not happen but very easily could have. 
Overall, the hotel was very nice and I would definitely go back.

name: The Westin Memphis Beale Street
description:
The Westin Memphis Beale Street is located in Memphis city center, opposite the Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum. Guests will enjoy a fitness center on-site.
Tea- and coffee-making facilities are included in every modern guestroom of this Memphis hotel. An iPod docking station is also included as well as a flat-screen cable TV.
Guests will have access to meeting and banquet facilities as well as a business center at the Westin Beale Street hotel. Concierge services are also available and guests can arrange a massage.
The Bleu Restaurant and Lounge is located at this hotel and serves a variety of seafood dishes. Guests will also be able to enjoy a beer or cocktail at the lounge.
This hotel is nest to the Gibson Guitar Corporation and 5 minutes’ drive from the National Civil Rights Museum. The Stax Museum of American Soul Music is 2.5 miles away.

address.full: 170 Lt. George W. Lee Avenue, Memphis, TN 38103, United States of America

name: Caption By Hyatt Beale Street Memphis
description:
Caption By Hyatt Beale Street Memphis has a fitness center, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Memphis. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is a 2-minute walk from Orpheum Theater, and within 1,200 feet of the city center.
The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Caption By Hyatt Beale Street Memphis rooms come with bed linen and towels.
A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is served at the property.
You can play pool at the accommodation, and car rental is available.
Popular points of interest near Caption By Hyatt Beale Street Memphis include Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum, FedExForum and AutoZone Park. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 10 miles from the hotel.

userReviews.title: 10/10 will recommend!
userReviews.positive: Great Property, only been open for 5mths. There was $10 parking across the street. We got a yellow tag so we could come in and out as we pleased. The room was a nice mid sized room and was very clean. The shower had 2 shower heads, one which was removable. The breakfast was nice and flavorful and seasoned to perfection. Ample seating in the lobby area. The staff was great. we stay NYE and one of the staff members ever helped us search for spots open late night for food after we partied all night on Beale street which was right up the street. walking distance.
userReviews.negative: After being on the road you’d expect to be able to check right into your hotel. Our check in was at 3pm however we weren’t able to check in until after 6pm. We arrived shortly after 4pm. They offered us free food and drinks at the bar which really helped knock the edge off. Luckily we didn’t have reservations for dinner. The staff remained calm and there was no sign of frustration on anyone’s face. They did apologize and worked quickly to get the crowed lobby serviced.  Nothing but respect for them. Upon checking out, I’m assuming a manager, also informed me that she would be taking $100 off our room as well. Even though this is in the negative section, their good outweighed the couple hours of checkin delay. Thank you.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis-Beale Street
description:
Located in the heart of the entertainment district, this hotel is located in downtown Memphis and offers complimentary daily breakfast and free WiFi.
Every room at Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis-Beale Street provides a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a work desk with a chair. Suites also include a separate living room area, microwave and refrigerator.
Guests can enjoy a swim in the indoor pool or work out at the on-site fitness center. A business center and meeting rooms are offered at the hotel.
Just 8.1 mi from the hotel, guests can explore Graceland, Elvis Presley's home. Memphis International Airport and the Memphis Zoo are both less than a 15-minute drive away.

userReviews.title: Good
userReviews.positive: For many years, I have stayed at the Hampton Inn on Beale for the annual International Blues Challenge because of the excellent location. I can always run to the room quickly to take a break or change clothes if needed. I feel safe walking  the one block from Beale to the hotel. However, the cost is high, especially with the daily parking garage fee. This facility is showing its age and could use a refresh in the bathroom especially.
userReviews.negative: The facility is showing its age and the bathroom especially could use a refresh and some updating. The cost is high, but I've been willing to pay it most years due to its handy location from Beale. The event I attend involves late nights, so it would be nice if the breakfast hours could be extended to reflect the hotel's appreciation of customers choosing this hotel for the International Blues Challenge week.

name: Hyatt Centric Beale Street Memphis
description:
Featuring a garden, a restaurant as well as a bar, Hyatt Centric Beale Street Memphis is located in the center of Memphis, a few steps from Orpheum Theater. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and free WiFi. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, evening entertainment and room service.
The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options.
Popular points of interest near the hotel include Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum, AutoZone Park and FedExForum. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 10 miles from Hyatt Centric Beale Street Memphis.
breakfast: Vegetarian, Vegan, American, Breakfast to go

I will definitely try again soon.

name: La Quinta by Wyndham Memphis Downtown
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at La Quinta by Wyndham Memphis Downtown! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Ideally set in the center of Memphis, La Quinta by Wyndham Memphis Downtown has free WiFi throughout the property, a fitness center and free private parking for guests who drive. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Fire Museum of Memphis is a 13-minute walk from the hotel and Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum is half a mile away.
At the hotel rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.
La Quinta by Wyndham Memphis Downtown offers a buffet or American breakfast.
The accommodation offers 3-star accommodations with an indoor pool and terrace.
Popular points of interest near La Quinta by Wyndham Memphis Downtown include AutoZone Park, FedExForum and Orpheum Theater. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 9.3 miles from the hotel.

name: Big Cypress Lodge
description:
Located within the iconic Memphis Pyramid, Big Cypress Lodge features accommodations with a 24-hour fitness center, private parking and a terrace. Located around 1.6 mi from Orpheum Theater, the resort with free WiFi is also 1.6 mi away from AutoZone Park. Guests can grab a bite to eat in either of the 2 on-site restaurant or relax in the bar.
All guest rooms at the resort are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. The rooms include a private bathroom with a bath. The rooms at Big Cypress Lodge include air conditioning and a desk.
With views overlooking downtown Memphis and the Mississippi River, the property offers a 13 lane bowling alley. A business center and vending machines with drinks are available on site at the accommodations. The reception can provide advice on the area in order to help guests plan their day.
Shuttle service is offered to downtown and Beale Street. FedExForum is 1.7 mi from Big Cypress Lodge. Memphis International Airport is 12 mi from the property.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Memphis Downtown Beale Street
description:
Hilton Garden Inn Memphis Downtown Beale Street in Memphis provides accommodations with a shared lounge and a bar. The property is set 1,300 feet from AutoZone Park and 2,300 feet from Orpheum Theater. The hotel features an American restaurant as well as free WiFi.
Rooms at the Hilton Garden Inn Memphis Downtown Beale Street offers air-conditioning, flat-screen TVs, microwave and small refrigerators are provided. A single-cup coffee maker and in-room safe are also included.
The reception can offer helpful tips for getting around the area.
Guests can enjoy a cocktail at The Greyhound Bar. Seasons Grille serves breakfast, dinner and evening room service.
FedExForum is 2,300 feet from the accommodations, while Fire Museum of Memphis is less than 0.6 mi away. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 9.3 mi from Hilton Garden Inn Memphis Downtown Beale Street .

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Memphis Downtown
description:
The Doubletree Hotel puts you in the heart of downtown Memphis.  Located directly across the street from AutoZone Baseball Park, home to the Memphis Redbirds AAA baseball team and Memphis 901 FC professional soccer team.
Our guest safety, security and health are paramount here at the Doubletree Hotel in downtown Memphis.  The Hilton CleanStay initiative takes our already stringent cleaning practices and takes them farther to make for a safer and cleaner environment where guests can feel more secure while traveling. For more on this program we encourage you to visit https://www.hilton.com/en/corporate/cleanstay/
Within three blocks from the historic Beale Street entertainment district, the Doubletree Hotel Downtown Memphis offers 280 modern, smoke-free sleeping rooms with amenities that include coffee & tea service, iron with ironing board, a flat screen cable television with premium channels, a comfortable work space, complimentary high-speed wireless internet, in-room safe and a private bathroom with shower/tub combination featuring complimentary toiletries and hair-dryers.
The property features full-service meeting and banquet space, King & Union Bar Grocery, a bar forward restaurant concept with the added benefit of locally made sundries, a Fitness Room and our Business Center which is located on the main level of the hotel.
If you are traveling with your four-legged friends, the Doubletree Hotel is pet-friendly.

name: Peabody Memphis
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Peabody Memphis! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Steps away from Beale Street, this famed hotel celebrates the Southern tradition and charm of its past while providing luxury accommodations, including fine dining options, an indoor pool, fitness center and full-service spa.
Each elegantly styled room features a 42-inch flat-screen cable TV and luxurious bathrobes. An executive work desk and plush seating area are also offered in all Memphis Peabody rooms.
Chez Philippe features gourmet French cuisine amid the elegance and prestige of the hotel’s signature dining room. Guests can enjoy Southern specialties for breakfast and premium steaks, porkchops and seafood for dinner at Capriccio Grill. Peabody Corner Bar offers a more casual, cozy setting for guests to enjoy a drink or bite from a selection of food and drink specials.
The hotel offers over 80,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, including a rooftop venue featuring views of the Mississippi River. The on-site business offers state-of-the-art telecommunication and photocopy equipment.
Memphis Rock ‘n Soul Museum, Gibson Guitar Factory, Orpheum Theater and FedEx Forum are all a 7-minute walk away from the hotel. Memphis International Airport is a 14-minute drive away.

name: Residence Inn Memphis Downtown
description:
This Marriott hotel is located in downtown Memphis, Tennessee and 15 minutes from Graceland.  It also features a gym. The rooms have a kitchen and living area.
Residence Inn Memphis Downtown guest rooms offer cable TV and a sofa.  The kitchen is equipped with a stovetop, refrigerator, microwave and dishwasher.
This Memphis Residence Inn provides laundry and dry cleaning service.  Room service and valet parking are also available.
Memphis International Airport is 20 minutes from Residence Inn Memphis Downtown.  The National Civil Rights Museum is within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

name: Holiday Inn - Memphis Downtown - Beale St., an IHG Hotel
description:
Located just 1 block from historic Beale Street, this downtown Memphis hotel features a spacious seasonal outdoor pool and 2 on-site restaurants. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.
The Holiday Inn Memphis-Downtown (Beale St.) offers sophisticated rooms decorated in deep brown and tan. Each is equipped with cable TV, a coffee maker and a work desk.
Russwood Park Grill serves American meals throughout the day, including prime rib and catfish. Guests have access to an on-site fitness center with cardio equipment and weights. The business center provides a public computer, fax and copy services.
The Downtown Memphis Holiday Inn is just across from the historic Peabody Hotel and a 7-minute walk from the Rock N’ Soul Museum.

name: Canopy By Hilton Memphis Downtown
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Canopy By Hilton Memphis Downtown! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Located in Memphis, a few steps from AutoZone Park, Canopy By Hilton Memphis Downtown has accommodations with a fitness center, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is a 6-minute walk from Orpheum Theater, and within 1,500 feet of the city center.
Guests at the hotel can enjoy an American breakfast.
Popular points of interest near Canopy By Hilton Memphis Downtown include FedExForum, Fire Museum of Memphis and Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 10 miles from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Napoleon, Ascend Hotel Collection
description:
Hotel Napoleon, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member is well located in the middle of Memphis, and is within a 2-minute walk of AutoZone Park and a 5-minute walk from Beale Street. The property is less than 0.6 mi from Memphis Rock n Soul Museum.
Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with bathrobes and free toiletries. All guest rooms at Hotel Napoleon, Ascend Collection have air conditioning and a desk.
Guests at the accommodations can enjoy an à la carte breakfast. Guests can enjoy a meal at the in-house restaurant, which specializes in American cuisine.
Orpheum Theater is  a 10-minute walk from Hotel Napoleon, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member, while FedExForum is an 8-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 7.5 mi from the property.

name: Hu Hotel Memphis
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hu Hotel Memphis! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Just a 5 minutes’ walk from Memphis Riverboats and the Mississippi River. Beale Street is 5 minutes' walk away.
Free WiFi, a 32-inch flat-screen cable TV, and iPod dock as well as a safety deposit box are provided in each room. A mini-bar with a refrigerator, single-serving coffee-making facilities, and an en suite are included.
The modern fitness center offers bottled water and chilled towels. A business center is also on site.
Memphis Central Station is just 1 miles from this boutique hotel. Memphis International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Crowne Plaza Memphis Downtown, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located in Memphis city center, this hotel is just 15 minutes’ walk from the bars and restaurants of Beale Street. It features an on-site restaurant, outdoor pool, and free Wi-Fi.
A flat-screen cable TV with pay-per-view movie channels is included in the contemporary guest rooms at Crowne Plaza Memphis Downtown. A work desk and coffee-making facilities including a mini-fridge are provided.
The modern Notes & Provisions Restaurant and Bar is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. It features a full-service bar and serves a variety of dishes.
Guests can browse the Memphis Crowne Plaza’s gift shop or work out in the on-site fitness center. A business center is located off of the 24-hour lobby. A transfer service is based on availability and travels within a 3 mi radius of the property.
The Cook Convention Center is less than 5 minutes’ walk from the Downtown Memphis Crown Plaza. The Pyramid Arena is less than 10 minutes away on foot.

address.full: 300 North Second Street, Memphis, TN 38105, United States of America

The bathroom had a small amount of mold on the ceiling and there was no place to set your wet bar of soap after washing your hands. No soap dish.  Also no towel rack other than inside the shower/bathtub. No luggage rack. I do NOT place my suitcases or bags on hotel floors and there was no place to put your bag other than on top of the desk or the only chair in the room. The ice machine on the floor I was in was also not functioning.

userReviews.title: It was okay wished it was a better turn out
userReviews.positive: Great location staff was so great and friendly very clean in the lobby area and bar area
userReviews.negative: We booked for the out door pool during 4th of July     So we would have something to do and a place to hang out with the family who we hadn’t seen in 3 years. But sadly the day we arrived is the day the pool closed for testing or readings of the water levels. (During the 4th of July weekend really) Therefore we had to find things to do during our stay. Things we didn’t really want to do ! We wanted to hang out at the pool again one of the main reasons why we choose the hotel. One other thing that I did not like was the bathroom toilet was stained yellow around the toilet floor! Ew! I paid for all 3 rooms in total of $1825 this included the breakfast or so I thought. Each room was booked for 4 people but only 2 people got to enjoy the breakfast because at check in I was informed that $1825 booked for 4 people per room only covers 2 people for breakfast each additional person was $15 each day (breakfast was not worth $15 for some powered eggs lol) after all that I still had to pay $150 deposit for each room I also thought that was a little high for a deposit. And a non working pool! I had to pay for parking even though we where Guest staying at their property that I was already paying for Need I remind you of the $1825 The extra $15 for each person for powdered eggs and the three $150 deposit for each room but now $22 for each of the 3 cars to have a parking spot really!!!!! If I would’ve known all this never again highway robbery
userReviews.room: Double Room with Two Double Beds

userReviews.title: Okay, don't plan on the restaurant after 7
userReviews.positive: The room was good.  It was large and I felt safe.  The city view was nice.  The shuttle to Beale Street was great.  The driver was awesome, he saw me on the street and allowed me to jump in the shuttle.
userReviews.negative:
The restaurant, I booked this hotel so I had the convenience of having a restaurant/bar at the hotel.  Only one night of the three I was able to order food.  The other nights the kitchen was closed early. They could have posted a sign to let guests know this so they can plan accordingly. The menu was very limited.  The service was good.  
Also, they offered no cleaning services or restocking of coffee and towels.  I had to go to front desk to get coffee each day.   No trash removal, and after three days the small trash cans were full .

userReviews.title: Pleasant

Also there was a fire alarm and after we went down 9 flights of stairs the staff acted like nothing happened. If we visit Memphis again we won't stay there again.

name: Hotel Indigo - Memphis Downtown, an IHG Hotel
description:
In a prime location in the center of Memphis, Hotel Indigo - Memphis Downtown, an IHG Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness center. This 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site.
At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. All guest rooms feature a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.
Hotel Indigo - Memphis Downtown, an IHG Hotel offers an à la carte or American breakfast.
There's an on-site snack bar and guests can also use the business area.
Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Fire Museum of Memphis, Orpheum Theater and AutoZone Park. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 10 miles from Hotel Indigo - Memphis Downtown, an IHG Hotel.

address.full: 22 North B.B. King Boulevard, Memphis, 38103, United States of America

She exemplifies Customer Service! If they are not paying her Her worth she needs to finds Someone who will. She is a Jewel! The Hotel has potential. Nice Rooms The hotel itself can us a little TLC. The Hotel restaurant the dinner was very good. I just wish they had more food options.
userReviews.negative: The Location! If we ever go back to Memphis I would stay a little closer to the action. Stay where people are on the streets at all times. Although The Indigo is about 2 -3 Blocks from Beale St. It’s situated where when you leave out walking or are returning from your walk you are away from other people on the streets and end up walking by yourself alone away from the crowds and on the last night there a homeless man that followed us all the way back to our hotel so I didn’t feel safe. Once we actually got to the Hotel there were people sitting outside and he went down the ally beside the hotel. The Hotel could use a little more cleaning. And don’t offer a text service if No One is going to answer it SMH!

name: MOXY Memphis Downtown
description:
Less than a mile away from the FedEx Forum, Orpheum Theater and Beale Street, this hotel is located in the heart of downtown Memphis and offers comfortable guest rooms with free WiFi.
Every room at Moxy Memphis Downtown provides a flat-screen TV. En-room bathrooms feature a hairdryer and complimentary bath amenities.
Guests can work out in the fitness center or utilize the on-site business center, which offers guest copy services. The hotel conference room can accommodate up to 14 people and features a large flat-screen TV.
Graceland, the home of the legendary Elvis Presley, is a 12-minute drive away from the hotel. Memphis International Airport is 11 miles away.

userReviews.title: Great facialities, location okay but some of the staff let it down..
userReviews.positive: Room was spacious and comfortable, had a cool vibe about it. Also - really good Mac and cheese! Liked that they had a pantry available for guests.
userReviews.negative:
This is a hard one for me, because I grew up working in hotels, but I wouldn’t return because of some of the staff. On a few occasions I was made to feel like a burden, I checked in Christmas Day, and one of the staff members was more interested in entertaining their friends rather than serving (the other staff member was nice). Could just be that Id had a full day of travel, so was hungry, tired and grumpy. I arrived late so got a few snacks from the pantry for dinner, but the hummus was out of date. 
The water issue. The issue itself wasn’t the hotels fault, but the way it was handled was poor from my perspective. Nice that bottled water was offered, but the staff on the desk were short and rude when asked where I could go to use the bathroom - if people are staying in a hotel, they’re likely not a local, so any help or guidance is appreciated and just a little of what could be offered in the circumstances, especially given they’re familiar with the area. Was also told that all guests received a phone call and an email, I received neither - not an issue; I couldn’t go anywhere, but I was made to feel stupid because I knew nothing about the issue. 
I will say that this wasn’t all staff, most were actually really friendly, but the above were the only two occasions I had to get help so one-on-one interactions.
userReviews.room: 245 SQ FT (23 SQM), Larger Guest room, 2 Double

name: SpringHill Suites Memphis Downtown
description:
Featuring an outdoor pool and complimentary breakfast, this Memphis, Tennessee hotel provides studios with free WiFi. Beale Street is within walking distance and the hotel is steps from the trolley line at Court Square.
At SpringHill Suites Memphis Downtown, every studio is furnished with a refrigerator and a microwave. Coffee facilities are included along with a flat-screen cable TV and premium movie channels.
A gym and a business center are available at the hotel. Memphis Downtown SpringHill Suites also offers on-site laundry facilities.
Downtown Memphis SpringHill Suites is within a 10-minute walk from AutoZone Park, home to the Memphis Redbirds baseball team. Memphis International Airport is 12 mi from the hotel.

name: Sheraton Memphis Downtown
description:
The full-service Sheraton Memphis Downtown is within walking distance of historic Beale street. A Main Street Trolley stop is located outside the hotel entrance. The trolley offers transportation to nearby popular attractions including the National Civil Rights Museum, FedEx Forum and South Main Historic Arts District. Graceland is 9.3 mi away.
Every room at Sheraton Memphis Downtown provides a 32-inch flat-screen LCD TV with premium cable channels and a large work area with a desk. Select rooms offer views of the Mississippi River. A small refrigerator and coffee maker are also included.
Crossroads Tavern & Grille is located on-site and offers Southern American cuisine, handcrafted cocktails and artisan wines. Prepared packaged to-go meals are also available. The property has complimentary laundry facilities onsite.
Over 16,000 square feet of flexible modern meeting space is available at the hotel, along with a 24-hour fitness center and business center. The on-site snack shop sells snacks, coffee and drinks.
Memphis International Airport is 11 miles away.

address.full: 250 North Main Street, Memphis, TN 38103, United States of America

userReviews.title: Lovely staff! Enjoyable stay.
userReviews.positive: The staff were very jovial, engaging and hospitable. The bed was extremely comfortable!
userReviews.negative: The checkin staff on arrival and departure were top notch: classy, efficient and personable. The Crossroads bar staff were also very engaging with the guests, including myself. I ordered a few drinks and an appetizer, the bar service, food quality and presentation was lovely. Room 732 needs some attention: 3 stains on the sheers, two of the bath product dispensers had fallen off the wall, and the acoustic (popcorn) ceiling felt a little dated. The quality of the in room bath products was exceptional. The maintenance call response time was under 10 minutes; housekeeping staff were friendly and accommodated my request for more coffee creamer and sugar from their car in the hallway in the morning. 4 out of 5 possible stars for the overall stay.

>Check-in for the hotel took a really long time, with only one employee working and a very long line. This didn't seem unique to us, as regularly saw long lines throughout our stay.
>They'd overbooked the room we paid for (King) and gave us a Twin instead. Received complimentary vouchers as an apology, but this seemed to be the normal thing, with so many people having these vouchers / in the same situation. Why overbook?
> Downside, the vouchers were only for 1 days use and we stayed 4 nights. Employee said to ask him for more on upcoming days, but then didn't seem to be working any other time so we missed out.
> The pool was too cold to go in, which was a shame.

name: Courtyard Memphis Downtown
description:
This Memphis, Tennessee hotel is 9.6 miles from Graceland, former home to Elvis Presley. The hotel features a hot tub and guest rooms boast 32-inch flat-screen cable TVs with HBO.
Each room at the Courtyard Memphis Downtown includes an iPod docking station and free Wi-Fi. All rooms are furnished with a refrigerator and coffee facilities.
Downtown Memphis Courtyard provides laundry facilities and vending machines.
The Gibson Retail Shop & Factory is less than one mile from the Memphis Courtyard Downtown. The hotel is steps from the historic Court Square Park and Main Street Trolley.

name: Comfort Inn Memphis Downtown
description:
The Comfort Inn Downtown is overlooking the Mississippi River and Mud Island River Park. The hotel is located in historic downtown, on the trolley line. FedEx Forum sports and entertainment venue, Renasant Convention Center , Beale Street and the National Civil Rights Museum are also close by.
Easy access to Interstate 40 and Interstate 55 make Graceland estate, the Memphis Zoo, Autozone Park, the Orpheum Theater and Mississippi's casinos easy to reach. There are a variety of restaurants and cocktail lounges nearby, and a short walk takes visitors to some of the best of Memphis BBQ and Blues.
Guests of this Memphis, TN hotel can enjoy many full-service amenities, free local calls, a fitness center and outdoor rooftop pool. Enjoy our free hot breakfast featuring eggs, meat, yogurt, fresh fruit, cereal and more.
Business travelers to this Memphis hotel can appreciate conveniences like free high-speed Internet access in the business center, free high-speed Internet access in all rooms and access to copy and fax services. The spacious meeting facility is just right for family reunions, business presentations and social gatherings.
The hotel features spectacular views of the Mississippi River with spacious guest rooms. In addition to standard amenities, guest rooms offer coffee makers, irons, ironing boards, microwaves and refrigerators. The business class suites feature microwaves, refrigerators, wet bars, two-line telephones and DVD players.

address.full: 100 North Front Street, Memphis, TN 38103, United States of America

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis Germantown
description:
Located in Memphis, 14 miles from Stax Museum of American Soul Music, Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis Germantown has accommodations with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a fitness center. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a business center and free WiFi. The hotel has family rooms.
All rooms at the hotel come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath or shower. At Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis Germantown the rooms include bed linen and towels.
Buffet and American breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation.
Brown Park is 15 miles from Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis Germantown, while Fire Museum of Memphis is 15 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 12 miles from the hotel.

name: Homewood Suites Memphis Germantown
description:
Located in Germantown, Tennessee, this hotel offers free shuttle services within a 5 miles radius and to Memphis International Airport. An outdoor pool is on-site and suites feature a full kitchen.
Every suite at the Homewood Suites Memphis Germantown also provides cable TV with pay-per-view movies and free Wi-Fi. A microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker are furnished in each suite as well.
A gym and business center are available at the Homewood Suites Germantown. The hotel also offers guest laundry facilities and a gift shop.
Graceland is 18 miles from Germantown Homewood Suites Memphis. The Memphis Zoo is 13 miles away and downtown Memphis is 20 miles from the hotel.

name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Memphis/Germantown, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located just off Highway 40, this Tennessee hotel features an indoor swimming pool and a daily continental breakfast.
A microwave and refrigerator are included in each room at Holiday Inn Express Hotel and Suites Germantown. A 47-inch TV, hairdryer and ironing facilities are included.
A business center and fitness center are available to guests at this Germantown hotel. A 24-hour reception and launderette are available for added guest convenience.
Memphis city center is 24 minutes’ drive from this Holiday Inn Express. Guests will be 16 miles from Memphis International Airport.

name: Quality Inn & Suites Germantown North
description:
The Comfort Inn & Suites hotel is located in a quiet suburban setting, with easy access to Interstate 40 and Interstate 240. This Germantown, TN hotel is convenient to the Memphis area and local venues, including Agricenter International, one of the world's largest urban farm and research test facilities, and the Agricenter Show Place Arena.
Additional points of interest include Beale Street, Memphis International Airport and University of Memphis. The area is host to several seasonal events and festivals. Germantown, Tennessee is famous for the Germantown Charity Horse Show. Visitors will enjoy browsing a wide variety of specialty shops at Wolfchase Galleria mall, less than seven miles away. There are several restaurants located in the surrounding area; many are within walking distance of the hotel.
Guests are invited to take advantage of full-service features and amenities, including free high-speed Internet access, free local calls, free weekday newspaper and free coffee in the lobby. Enjoy our free hot breakfast featuring eggs, meat, yogurt, fresh fruit, cereal and more.
This Germantown, TN hotel also has an indoor heated pool. Guests can enjoy the manager's reception with popcorn and cookies. Business travelers can appreciate the convenience of an on-site business center, voice mail and competitive corporate rates.
All spacious guest rooms feature irons, ironing boards, coffee makers, hair dryers and cable television. In addition to standard amenities, some rooms have whirlpool bathtubs, microwaves and refrigerators. Two-room suites are available. This is a pet-friendly hotel. Valet cleaning services are provided for guest convenience.

name: Courtyard Memphis East/Bill Morris Parkway
description:
Courtyard Memphis East/Bill Morris Parkway, 6 miles from the Mike Rose Soccer Complex, features an outdoor pool. Guest rooms offer cable TV with HBO and free Wi-Fi.
Rooms provide seating areas and desks. They also have ironing facilities, hairdryers and coffee makers.
Memphis East Courtyard serves breakfast and has barbecue facilities and a 24-hour market. A gym, business center and meeting room are available to guests. The hotel also has an airline reservation desk.
Courtyard Memphis East/Bill Morris Parkway is within 10 miles of University of Memphis and Liberty Bowl college football stadium. It is within 12 miles of Memphis International Airport and Memphis Zoo.

This would be a great place for longer stays.

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Memphis - Mt Moriah
description:
This Extended Stay America - Memphis - Mt. Moriah is located in Memphis and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Memphis is equipped with a stove top, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities and upgraded bedding with extra pillows in every room.
A grab-and-go breakfast is served every morning and includes bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea.
The property offers free onsite parking. Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Memphis Zoo, the Gracel and and the Downtown Memphis .

Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Memphis is equipped with a stovetop, a microwave and a refrigerator. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities and upgraded bedding with extra pillows in every room.
The property offers free onsite parking. A grab-and-go breakfast is served every morning and includes bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea.
Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Memphis Zoo, the Gracel and and the Civil Rights Museum.

userReviews.title: Pros and Cons for this hotel.
userReviews.positive: My room for 2 nights was very large complete with a small 'kitchen'.  Microwaver, full size fridge and a stove top.  However, no pots and pans or dishes to be able to make use of the kitchen!  Everything was very clean, bathroom very nice as well.  I was also able to do my laundry in a very large, multiple machine laundry room.
userReviews.negative: The internet was very poor.  They provide a very slow (2 bars) internet that is only good for basic use.  For a higher speed you must pay $6 a day for the internet.  I was amazed as this was the first time on my 4 week trip that a hotel was charging for internet.  I was also concerned about the groups of men loitering in the parking lot....10-12 guys just hanging around talking and smoking.  Not sure what they were doing and I was a bit concerned for my car.

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Memphis - Germantown West
description:
Located in Memphis, Tennessee, this hotel is 4 miles from Shelby Farms Park and 6 miles from Golf and Games Family Park. Guests will enjoy free Wi-Fi and an on-site launderette.
All accommodations feature a microwave, small refrigerator, and stovetop. This Memphis - Germantown West Extended Stay America also provides a flat-screen cable TV, seating area and dining area.
A grab-and-go breakfast is served every morning and includes bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea.
Extended Stay America - Memphis -Germantown West is pet friendly and offers free on-site parking. A 24-hour reception and vending machines are available for added convenience.
Guests will be 9 miles from the Memphis Zoo and 12 miles from Memphis International Airport. Elvis Presley’s iconic home, Graceland Mansion, is 14 miles away.

She was very sarcastic for no reason when there was an inconvenience that prohibited us from checking in properly. When asked about what to do, who to call, and if she was serious, she replied very sarcastically,” For real, for real,” and proceeded to roll her eyes and say that she had no rooms available because the third party website did not explain what she had to us and did not show our booking. However, after we were making plans to go back home, she proceeded to give us a room about 15 minutes later. With the already frustrating encounter and inconvenience from the third party website confusion, the tone, attitude, and sarcasm were not needed. We were very nice and were not unpleasant in any manner, unlike her. No one made her choose the job and position she has. If she is unhappy, she either needs to quit or take up her concerns to her boss because the customers are the ones who give her a job to do in the first place. Very unpleasant checking in experience overall.

userReviews.title: Too much money for a disappointing room.
userReviews.positive: The staff was cordial. The sheets were clean.
userReviews.negative:
This hotel comes up on Booking.com as an “airport hotel,” but that is not accurate. It is over 7 miles from the terminal and our Uber ride was over $40. We would have saved money by choosing a higher priced hotel closer to the airport. 
Booking.com’s listing said “free cancellation anytime.” It was only after making the reservation that we received an email confirmation stating that we could not cancel for free after 6 PM - that is not the same as “anytime.”
The room was in disrepair, appearing as if it was undergoing remodeling. An extra mattress leaned against the wall. There was standing water on the bathroom floor.  Painting and other other repairs were unfinished or sloppily applied.
There was only one towel for the two of us, no visible wastebasket, no drinking cups and no hangers in the closet. The security lock on the inside of the door was broken. Perhaps most disappointing, though the room was marked “no smoking,” it had a very strong smell of smoke, as if the rooms around or below it were smoking rooms.

description:
Located on a main thoroughfare 11 mi from downtown, Sonesta ES Suites Memphis features an outdoor swimming pool and a gym. Rooms include a kitchen area with refrigerator and stove. A prepackaged breakfast is provided. Breakfast items include a muffin or Danish, granola bar, whole piece of fruit and a bottle of water.  A coffee station is also available in the morning.
All guest rooms have a cable TV and free Wi-Fi access. A tea/coffee maker allows guests to enjoy a hot drink in the room. Also available are a hair dryer, iron and ironing board.
Guests can make use of a fresh grocery delivery service. The property also features a barbecue facility.
Memphis Sonesta ES Suites is 9.9 mi from Elvis Presley’s Graceland and 12 miles from Memphis International Airport. The University of Memphis is just 12 mi away.

userReviews.negative:
I could not contact the property for 3 weeks of trying. 
Via email through the app twice and phone calls directly to the hotel multiple times. 
I eventually tried the corporate main number twice and the Booking.com number twice. 
My daughter eventually was able to contact the corporate office while I was on the road. She did a 3-way call so I could get my concerns taken care of. 
The room was not clean, the walls were visibly dirty around the doors etc, and around the toilet was not clean. Around the floors in the kitchen.
There were no towels for the kitchen. I used a bath towel. No dish detergent for hand washing the dishes or the counters.
Floor boards and the shower and sink in the bathroom were dirty upstairs. 
The rooms need to be updated and painted, stained carpets throughout.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis East
description:
Close to a variety of corporate offices in Memphis's business district, this hotel offers a great location just off Interstate 240 as well as several comfortable amenities and services.
Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis East- Shady Grove is surrounded by things to do and see. Guests can tour Graceland or play a game of golf on one of the area's championship golf courses. A wide range of museums, theaters and shopping is also just minutes away.
Guests can go for a swim in the outdoor pool or work out in the modern fitness center. Shady Grove Hampton Inn Memphis also provides a free morning breakfast and evening room service is available from nearby Frank Gristanti's Italian Restaurant.

name: Embassy Suites Memphis
description:
Located near Interstate 240, this hotel is 8 mi from Memphis International Airport. Features include an on-site restaurant and spacious suites with two streaming flat-screen TVs.
In addition to Free WiFi, every modern suite at the Embassy Suites Memphis is equipped with a microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker. A seating area with sofa bed is standard in all suites as well.
Guests of the Memphis Embassy Suites can enjoy free access to the indoor pool and fitness center. Frank Gristanti’s Restaurant specializes in Northern Italian cuisine for lunch and dinner. Breakfast buffet is available daily at the Embassy Suites Memphis.
Free parking is provided at the hotel, which is 4 miles from Audubon Golf Course. Graceland, the former home and museum of Elvis Presley, is 8.9 mi away.

address.full: 1022 South Shady Grove Road, Memphis, TN 38120, United States of America

name: La Quinta by Wyndham Memphis Primacy Parkway
description:
Located next to St. Francis Hospital off Interstate 240, this Memphis hotel features a daily hot breakfast, heated outdoor pool and comfortable guest rooms with free WiFi.
Every room at La Quinta Inn & Suites Memphis Primacy Parkway provides a Samsung flat-screen HDTV with plug-and-play device connectivity and a coffee maker. Select rooms also offer a seating area, microwave and refrigerator.
Guests at the Memphis Primacy Parkway La Quinta Inn and Suites can work out in the on-site fitness center or utilize the meeting facilities. Guest laundry facilities and free on-site parking are also offered.
Graceland, home of the King of Rock 'n' Roll, is 20 minutes' drive from the hotel. The University of Memphis is 5 miles away, while the National Civil Rights Museum is a 25-minute drive from the hotel.

address.full: 1236 Primacy Parkway, Memphis, TN 38119, United States of America

name: Courtyard by Marriott Memphis East/Park Avenue
description:
The Courtyard Memphis East/Park Avenue is located 12 miles from downtown Memphis and the Memphis International Airport. The property features an outdoor pool, on-site restaurant, and free Wi-Fi.
All rooms feature cable TV, sofa bed, and desk with ergonomic chair at the Courtyard Memphis. Guests have coffee-making facilities and a microwave as well.
An enhanced business center and digital message board with news, weather, and airport updates are featured in the The Courtyard Memphis East Park Avenue lobby. A picnic area and barbecue facilities are available.
Guests will find breakfast and dinner options at The Bistro, which also serves as a full-service bar each evening. The Market is open 24 hours a day and provides a small selection of snacks and beverages.
Courtyard Memphis East/Park Avenue is 10 miles from Graceland, and 13 miles from the National Civil Rights Museum. Free public parking is available upon request.

name: Hyatt Place Memphis Primacy Parkway
description:
Located in Memphis, Hyatt Place Memphis Primacy Parkway features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. This 3-star hotel offers free WiFi. The property is located 9.9 mi from Stax Museum of American Soul Music.
At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, while some units at Hyatt Place Memphis Primacy Parkway also have a seating area. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge.
Guests of this accommodations can workout in the fitness center. A business center, as well as a 24-hour front desk, are available.
Graceland is 9.9 mi from Hyatt Place Memphis Primacy Parkway, while Sun Studio is 11 mi away. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 7.5 mi from the property.

address.full: 1220 Primacy Parkway, Memphis, TN 38117, United States of America

name: Hampton Inn Memphis-Walnut Grove/Baptist East
description:
This Memphis hotel is off Interstate 240 and within a 5-minute walk to Baptist Memorial Hospital-Memphis. This hotel features an outdoor pool, gym and a daily breakfast.
The Hampton Inn Memphis-Walnut Grove- Baptist East features a business center.Guests can get coffee in the lobby.
Rooms at the Walnut Grove Hampton Inn are equipped with cable TV and free Wi-Fi. The rooms also have a coffee maker and ironing facilities.
Hampton Inn Memphis is 11 miles from the Memphis Rock N Soul Museum. Shelby Farm Park is within a 5-minute drive of the hotel.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Memphis East
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Four Points by Sheraton Memphis East! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Less than a 20-minute drive to downtown’s Beale Street and Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum, this hotel is located in Memphis, TN and features a seasonal outdoor pool, on-site restaurant and complimentary airport shuttle services. Free WiFi access is available.
Every room at Four Points by Sheraton Memphis East provides a 32-inch flat-screen LCD TV with cable channels, a small refrigerator and complimentary bottled water.
River Oaks offers bistro-style French and American cuisine for lunch and dinner. A full and continental breakfast buffet is offered each morning at the hotel. In-room dining services are offered for guest convenience.
A 24-hour fitness center, business center and flexible meeting and event space are all available on-site. The hotel also includes an on-site market, vending machines and guest laundry services.
FedEx Forum is a 20-minute drive away. The hotel is 5 miles away from the University of Memphis and an 11-minute drive from Memphis International Airport.

name: Staybridge Suites Memphis-Poplar Ave East, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located in Memphis, Staybridge Suites Memphis-Poplar Ave East, an IHG Hotel has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, shared lounge, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 10 miles from Stax Museum of American Soul Music, 11 miles from Brown Park and 12 miles from Fire Museum of Memphis. AutoZone Park is 12 miles away and FedExForum is 12 miles from the hotel.
A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available each morning at the property.
A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the hotel. Staff at Staybridge Suites Memphis-Poplar Ave East, an IHG Hotel are always available to provide advice at the reception.
Orpheum Theater is 12 miles from the accommodation, while Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum is 12 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 8.1 miles from Staybridge Suites Memphis-Poplar Ave East, an IHG Hotel.

name: Wingate by Wyndham Memphis East
description:
The Wingate by Wyndham Memphis East is just a 15-minute drive from Memphis city center and a 24-minute drive from Graceland. Features include a hot breakfast, free WiFi, and rooms with a flat-screen TV.
A small refrigerator and a microwave are included in all rooms at Wingate by Wyndham Memphis East. Extras include a desk and a hairdryer.
Guests of Wingate by Wyndham Memphis East can start the day with a breakfast of waffles and sausage. A variety of baked goods and cereal are available as well as fruit, coffee, and juice.
Meeting facilities, which can accommodate up to 24 people, are offered on site. Free parking is provided as well.
Libertyland is a 10-minute drive from Wingate by Wyndham Memphis East, while Audubon Park is 6.8 mi away.

address.full: 6069 Macon Cove, Memphis, TN 38134-7600, United States of America

The rooms needed some TLC … we had two rooms.  One toilet seat was way loose, and really just needed to be replaced.  I asked it to be replaced while we were gone for the day… we returned after 6 hours and it had only been slightly tightened, but that’s all.  It was still very wobbly, and not exactly safe for the two 80+ year old women who occupied the room.  
The breakfast was not good.  The food was almost out with one hour remaining in breakfast service time.  It was certainly not up to the usual standard for hotels such as this.   We went to Cracker Barrel the 2nd morning (which fortunately is less than 2 miles away).

name: Marriott Memphis East
description:
Located 20 minutes’ drive from Central Memphis, this hotel offers and indoor pool. It also features a fitness center, and on-site dining.
A cable TV and coffee-making facilities are featured in all rooms at this Memphis Marriott. Each room is decorated with hardwood furniture and blackout curtains for additional comfort.
Marriott Memphis East offers a business center, and free transport service to local area attractions within a 5 miles radius. Free parking is available.
Coda serves Southern cuisine featuring locally sourced, organic ingredients. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in a casual atmosphere.
Graceland, the famous home of Elvis Presley, is 15 minutes' drive from Marriott Memphis East. The University of Memphis is within 5 miles of the hotel.

address.full: 5795 Poplar Avenue, Memphis, TN 38119, United States of America

After sitting the young lady was rude in her approach and very unprofessional.   She needs some training. However the next morning was a lot better but an older lady with glasses served us. name: Hilton Memphis
description:
Located in the heart of the Business District, this East Memphis hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, 24-hour business center and free airport shuttle services. Free WiFi access is available.
Every room at Hilton Memphis provides a flat-screen HDTV with premium cable and movie channels, along with a coffee maker and ironing facilities. Select rooms also include a seating area and a wet bar.
The Ridgelake Restaurant is open for breakfast and offers freshly-made classic American favorites with a twist. Guests can grab a drink and a bite while admiring views of the hotel grounds at The Lobby Bar. Provisions Market offers a selection of to-go pizzas, sandwiches and entrees. In-room dining services are available for guest convenience.
The hotel offers a 24-hour business center with modern business amenities, including fax, copy and video conferencing services. Over 30,000 square feet of flexible event space is also offered at the hotel.
Beale Street, Graceland and FedEx Forum are all 13 mi away from the hotel. Shelby Farms Park is 5 mi away, while Memphis International Airport is a 13-minute drive from the hotel.

address.full: 939 Ridge Lake Boulevard, Memphis, TN 38120, United States of America

name: Marriott Memphis East
description:
Located 20 minutes’ drive from Central Memphis, this hotel offers and indoor pool. It also features a fitness center, and on-site dining.
A cable TV and coffee-making facilities are featured in all rooms at this Memphis Marriott. Each room is decorated with hardwood furniture and blackout curtains for additional comfort.
Marriott Memphis East offers a business center, and free transport service to local area attractions within a 5 miles radius. Free parking is available.
Coda serves Southern cuisine featuring locally sourced, organic ingredients. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in a casual atmosphere.
Graceland, the famous home of Elvis Presley, is 15 minutes' drive from Marriott Memphis East. The University of Memphis is within 5 miles of the hotel.

userReviews.positive: the size of the room is really good, and the bed is one of the most comfortable one the I ever slept in a hotel. Room very clean and with new furniture.  Shower in a good size and excellent flow.
userReviews.negative: Breakfast buffet should be with more options and a la carte ones. In fact, the only improvement point that I see is in the restaurant structure and menu. The lack of a room service also is a low point to me. The week of my stay was under the worse weather, with icy storms, so one night I could not have dinner at the restaurant because there were so many people in there, they have stopped serving food. userReviews.title: Train your employees to be better customer oriented.
userReviews.negative: Attitudes!  The first day I arrived the service for breakfast was not typical of Marriott service.  I arrived to the area, and was rudely greeted, first I had to ask the young lady if we needed to sit anywhere or would she seat us, next think I heard was "sit anywhere we'll get to you"  from a older gentlemen.  After sitting the young lady was rude in her approach and very unprofessional.   She needs some training. However the next morning was a lot better but an older lady with glasses served us.  She was very professional  and service oriented.  Compliments to her.   She met Marriott service standards.

For the price- at least breakfast should be included- $200 a night is excessive for the amenities.

name: Quality Inn & Suites Memphis East
description:
Offering a free continental breakfast, Quality Inn & Suites Memphis East is 8.1 mi from University of Memphis and The Commons shopping mall. Features include free WiFi and a seasonal outdoor pool.
You will find a flat-screen cable TV, refrigerator, and microwave in the room. Extras include a coffee machine and a desk. All rooms also have a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower.
You will find a free business center at the property alongside fax and photocopy services for a fee. Laundry facilities and free on-site parking are provided as well.
This hotel is 19 mi from Graceland, the former home of Elvis Presley, and the Memphis International Airport. Beale Street nightlife is 23 minutes' drive away.

name: Comfort Inn & Suites
description:
Comfort Inn & Suites is located 20 minutes outside of downtown Memphis and Graceland, Elvis Presley’s home. It features a full-service business center and spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi.
Comfort Inn & Suites offers a coffee maker, seating area and a work desk in every room. Cable TV with HBO is provided and some rooms feature an in-room spa bath.
Comfort Inn & Suites has an on-site gym with modern equipment as well as laundry facilities. A full continental breakfast with waffles, eggs, pastries and juice is served daily.
The Memphis Botanic Garden is a 15-minute drive from the Comfort Inn & Suites. Memphis Cook Convention Center is 20 minutes from the hotel and the National Civil Rights Museum is within a 30-min drive.

address.full: 6010 Macon Cove, Memphis, TN 38134, United States of America

name: Motel 6-Memphis, TN - East
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Motel 6-Memphis, TN - East! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Located less than 17 miles from the Memphis International Airport, Motel 6 Memphis Northeast offers rooms with free WiFi and cable TV.
The air-conditioned rooms at Motel 6 Memphis Northeast are decorated with wooden furnishings. All rooms have a work desk and an private bathroom.
The property's business center offers fax and photocopying services. The hotel also offers a 24-hour reception and laundry facilities.
A wide variety of restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance of Motel 6 Memphis Northeast. Graceland is only 17.4 miles from the hotel, and the University of Memphis is 7.2 miles away. Free parking is available on site.

name: Americas Best Value Inn & Suites - Memphis East
description:
Located off Interstate 40, this Memphis hotel serves a daily hot continental breakfast and features rooms with free Wi-Fi and a cable TV.  Wolfchase Galleria Shopping Mall is 5.2 mi away.
A microwave, fridge and coffee maker are provided in all rooms at Americas Best Value Inn.  Each room features a spacious work desk and a seating area.
Free access to a picnic area and an outdoor terrace are available to guests.  A business center with free WiFi is located in the hotel’s lobby.
The Memphis Americas Best Value Inn is 6.5 mi Quail Ridge Golf Course.  Historic Graceland and the Memphis International Airport are both within 20 minutes' drive away.

address.full: 1541 Sycamore View Road, Memphis, TN 38134, United States of America

userReviews.negative:
It was undergoing a remodel. The manager called to tell us that our door was wide open, when I personally checked it, before we left. Thankfully, nothing was missing. Kudos for the maid, who reported it and the desk clerk who called.
The staff seems grumpy all the time. No smiles, no friendly gestures. It was like we were an inconvenience that they had to put up with. Most places where we stayed (we travel a LOT) had “grab and go” breakfast available, because of Covid. This place advertised breakfast, but offered nothing.

userReviews.title: Cheap stay but you will feel dirty
userReviews.positive: The only thing I like about the property is how close the room was to the interstate and the location of the property wasn’t that bad mainly surrounded by other hotels
userReviews.negative: If you are staying for one night and won’t be sober then this might be the room for you. Firstly they don’t inform you on the booking that you have to pay $50 per room as a “clean/safety” fee that you will only get back once you check out and they check the room. Then you have the fact that you can’t access some of the rooms considering the fact that there’s a huge hole in the floor (and it was right next to my door). Going into the room, the door is raggedy, the room smelled musty, and the tub and toilet was disgusting. Honestly if I wasn’t being charged $81 to cancel, I would’ve canceled and went to another hotel. The bed was uncomfortable and I had to spray it down with sanitizer (which I do to all hotels anyways).

name: Hampton Inn Memphis Poplar
description:
This Tennessee hotel is off Interstate 240 and 10 miles from Memphis. This hotel features an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV in every room.
Guest rooms at the Hampton Inn Memphis-Poplar are equipped with cable TV and pay-per-view movies. The rooms also have a coffee maker and free weekday newspapers.
The Memphis-Poplar Hampton Inn offers a daily breakfast to guests. Guests can use the business center or the gym.
The Poplar Hampton Inn is 5 miles from the Pink Palace Museum. The hotel is within a 20-minute drive to the Memphis Zoo.
The Property is not accepting cash.

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Memphis I-240 & Perkins
description:
This hotel is 14 miles from downtown Memphis and within a 15 minute drive of the Liberty Bowl Stadium Sports Arena. The hotel offers a free airport shuttle.
Rooms at Fairfield Inn & Suites Memphis I-240 & Perkins include a coffee maker and work desk. Each comes equipped with free Wi-Fi and pay-per-view movies.
Guests at the Fairfield Inn can swim in the outdoor pool or relax in the hot tub. The hotel also has a gym.
The Fairfield Inn and Suites is within a 20 minute drive of the historic Beale Street, which is known for blues music. The hotel is 10 miles from Graceland, the historic home of Elvis and museum.

name: Sleep Inn & Suites
description:
Located 14 miles from Central Memphis, this Tennessee hotel features a daily continental breakfast, outdoor pool, and fully-equipped fitness center. Memphis International Airport is 6 miles away.
All guest rooms include a cable TV, small seating area, and desk. For added convenience, Sleep Inn & Suites provides a lap desk and bedside lamp.
Sleep Inn & Suites offers pre-packed breakfast bags and free on-site parking. Business travelers can hire visual and audio equipment to host events in the meeting facilities.
Guests can visit the National Civil Rights Museum or take a riverboat ride of the Mississippi River 14 miles away. The hotel is 13 miles from the Memphis Rock and Soul Museum.

name: classic inn
description:
The Rodeway Inn hotel is located just minutes from Beale Street, a favorite destination offering lots of good music, good food and good times. This hotel is also close to many popular attractions and landmarks like: FedEx Forum arena, Graceland estate, former home of Elvis Presley, Memphis Zoo, Mud Island River Park, Pyramid Arena.
Both the University of Memphis and the Memphis International Airport are seven miles away. The Thousand Oaks Business Center is across the street from the hotel. Several shops, entertainment venues, and a wide variety of restaurants and cocktail lounges can be found in the surrounding area.
This hotel offers guests many amenities, including: Free hot breakfast, Free newspaper, Free local calls and free parking are provided. In addition, free coffee is available 24 hours a day in the hotel lobby.
Business travelers will appreciate free high-speed Internet access and access to copy and fax services.
All guest rooms come equipped with hair dryers, coffee makers, irons and ironing boards. Some rooms feature microwaves and refrigerators.
Group and corporate rates are available. This is a pet-friendly hotel; additional fees and restrictions apply.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Memphis
description:
In the Clark Tower Complex business district in east Memphis, Tennessee, this hotel features free airport transportation as well as comfortable guestrooms that are filled with convenient amenities.
Doubletree Hotel Memphis is just a short drive from attractions such as Graceland, The National Civil Rights Museum and the Memphis Zoo. Guests can explore historic Beale Street or go shopping at Oak Court Mall.
The guestrooms at the Doubletree East Memphis feature refrigerators and free high-speed internet access. Go for a swim in the indoor pool or work out in the fitness center. Our restaurant, Erling Jensen Small Bites and TopGolf Swing Suites, located on-site, is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: Quality Inn
description:
The Quality Inn hotel is conveniently located just minutes from downtown with easy access to Interstate 40 and Interstate 240.
Full-service amenities and hotel features include free newspaper, free local calls .
This Memphis, TN hotel provides business travelers with modern conveniences like free high-speed Internet access, data port telephones, and access to copy and fax services.
In addition to standard amenities, guest rooms feature oversize showers, relaxing chairs, cable television with free HBO, large desks and two-line telephones. Some rooms come equipped with refrigerators and microwaves.
Swimming pool, Fitness center and Hot Breakfast are temporarily closed due to this on going pandemics.

name: Comfort Inn & Suites Airport-American Way Memphis
description:
Located off Interstate 240, this all nonsmoking hotel offers easy access to Memphis city center, FedEx Forum, National Civil Rights Museum, Orpheum Theater, Rock N Soul Museum and the Liberty Bowl Stadium. The hotel is 15 minutes' drive from Elvis Presley's Graceland.
The hotel provides guests with free wireless high-speed Internet.
Your Morning Breakfast is full of quick options, making breakfast at the Comfort Inn & Suites Airport-American Way the perfect way to start your day. Enjoy our free Grab & Go breakfast featuring muffins, yogurt, fresh fruit, coffee and more.
On hand for our business travelers: a business center including access to copy and fax services. Conference rooms are available for meetings as well as a free shuttle to the Memphis International Airport.
All guest rooms are equipped with a microwave, refrigerator, coffee makers, hair dryers, iron and ironing boards. Available in a limited amount of rooms are whirlpool tubs and wet bars.

name: Holiday Inn Memphis-University of Memphis, an IHG Hotel
description:
Providing free shuttle service to sites within a 3 miles radius, this all-suite property in Memphis, Tennessee is located on the campus of the University of Memphis. Free Wi-Fi is available.
A microwave and a small refrigerator are available in each guest suite at the Holiday Inn Memphis-University of Memphis. A work desk and TV are also available.
Guests can work out in the on-site fitness center or shop for souvenirs at the on-site gift shop. A business center with fax and photocopying facilities is available for added convenience.
Shopping at Oak Court Mall is just 3 minutes’ drive from University of Memphis Holiday Inn. Memphis Zoo and Lichterman Nature Center  are both less than 6 miles from this hotel.

name: The Guest House at Graceland
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Guest House at Graceland! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Less than a 5-minute walk from Elvis Presley's Graceland Mansion, The Guest House at Graceland offers accommodations with 2 on-site restaurants, a theater and outdoor pool with pool bar. Complimentary airport shuttle service and an evening Peanut Butter and Jelly Bar is offered.
A flat-screen cable TV, work desk and coffee maker is provided in each room. There is also a seating area and compact refrigerator. Select rooms offer views of the courtyard. Room service is offered for guest convenience.
A fitness center, business center and gift shop are available to guests. There are several lounge areas around the property for guests to relax or converse. Guests can enjoy the outdoor lawn and courtyard area. Guests can ask concierge for local area suggestions.
Delta’s Kitchen offers an array of Southern comfort dishes, including contemporary twists on some of Elvis Presley’s favorite foods. Guests can grab a drink and a bite for breakfast, lunch and dinner at EP’s Bar & Grill.
Beale Street is 8 mi from The Guest House at Graceland, and the Memphis Zoo is a 15-minute drive away. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 2.5 mi from The Guest House at Graceland.
breakfast: Continental, American, Buffet, Breakfast to go

userReviews.title: Exceptional
userReviews.positive: The hotel is at the left side of Graceland which was our main reason to visit Memphis.  The rooms have beautiful pictures of Elvis suits and/or cars.  The room is beautiful.  They have a cinema to watch Elvis movies.  The Lobby is beautiful too.  It is a must stay hotel if you are an Elvis Presley's Fan.  Graceland guest relations place is across the street and you can walk to the gates of Graceland from the hotel.  The restaurant for breakfast is great, (not included on the room rate).
userReviews.negative: Service at the EP's Bar and Grill was not great.  We had to wait almost 20 minutes for craft beers to arrive at out table while the server was talking to other servers.  The wait time was uncomfortable. The only one who was kind to us while at the table, was the lady who was cleaning the table.
