name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Memphis Arpt Elvis Presley Blv, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located in Memphis, a 14-minute walk from Elvis Presley's Graceland, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Memphis Arpt Elvis Presley Blv, an IHG Hotel provides accommodations with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a fitness center. This 3-star hotel offers free shuttle service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum is 7.2 miles away and FedExForum is 7.2 miles from the hotel.
Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and American options.
A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the hotel.
Stax Museum of American Soul Music is 4.8 miles from Holiday Inn Express & Suites Memphis Arpt Elvis Presley Blv, an IHG Hotel, while Brown Park is 6.8 miles away. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 2.5 miles from the accommodation.

userReviews.title: Hotel is the highlight. Memphis is sad
userReviews.positive: The hotel is wonderful! Appears near-new! Teena was friendly and welcoming
userReviews.negative:
Memphis in general is in sad shape. Graceland is a huge tourist draw, but the entire area is run down, closing. This hotel may be a step to help improve the area - it was nice, looked nearly new. There were street repairs near there, but the plates were moved and the gap in the street is scary. 
Businesses near the tourist attraction? Nope. In general, Memphis needs to improve a lot to keep people coming in. We left there feeling sorry for your city. Probably won't return.

name: Quality Inn Airport I-240
description:
This Tennessee hotel is 1.9 mi from Graceland. Guests will enjoy free airport transport service, a daily hot breakfast, and seasonal outdoor pool.
A microwave and small refrigerator for late night snacks are included in all guest rooms. Quality Inn Airport I-240 also provides a desk and coffee-making facilities.
Quality Inn Airport I-240 guests will have access to free WiFi and a fitness center. A business center and on-site launderette are available for added convenience.
The Quality Inn Airport I-240 is 1.9 mi from the Memphis International Airport and a 15-minute drive of the Memphis Convention Center. Central Memphis is 8.7 mi away.

userReviews.negative: While it was great to have gated parking, there was absolutely nowhere to park. We parked in an unmarked area by the dumpsters and worried all night we might be towed. userReviews.title: Reasonably priced, friendly & accommodating staff, industrial area with little options for food.
userReviews.positive: Friendly and helpful staff. Accommodated my airport shuttle request an hour earlier than they typically begin running on the weekends - 7am vs 8am. The room was somewhat updated and relatively comfortable. I didn't use the wifi but my Verizon cellular reception was excellent in this area so I had no issues using the internet. The breakfast offered was odd but in a good way. There were pre-packaged stuffed pastries and pepperoni hot pockets. I may be a child but I actually preferred that weird selection versus most budget hotel breakfast options.
userReviews.negative:
This area of town is very industrial so if your goal is to walk somewhere for food you're out of luck. I had to walk about 10 minutes to a gas station just for something to drink. This is obviously not the hotel's fault, just FYI. Also, food delivery in the area is a bit limited, even the app-based stuff.
The window air conditioner worked well and first but it's performance seemed to slip as the night went on. It was also a bit noisy (squeals, shrieks). I like my room ice cold and while I didn't get too warm it was borderline (i.e., I didn't need to sleep under the covers).

userReviews.title: Have stayed in several other quality Inns, this one comes a bit short compare to other Quality Inns.
userReviews.positive: Like other Quality Inns that I have stayed free coffee available all time is a big plus, coffee was decent quality.
userReviews.negative: Limited parking space and awkward getting in and out of parking lot.
userReviews.room: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds - Non-Smoking

name: Travelodge by Wyndham Memphis Airport/Graceland
description:
Featuring 2-star accommodations, Travelodge by Wyndham Memphis Airport/Graceland is located in Memphis, 1.7 miles from Elvis Presley's Graceland and 4.4 miles from Stax Museum of American Soul Music. Featuring a fitness center, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides a shared lounge, a 24-hour front desk and organizing tours for guests.
Guest rooms include a safety deposit box.
The hotel has a sun terrace.
Brown Park is 6.5 miles from Travelodge by Wyndham Memphis Airport/Graceland, while Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum is 6.8 miles away. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 2.5 miles from the accommodation.

userReviews.negative: Parkin situation they give u parking passes to park but people that don't even have rooms take up the the spaces but they have other parkin on the other side witch is reserved for contractors but it's never full I've stayed over 30 times the parking lot could be full and guest have to wait in there cars or circle the lot waiting fornsoneoe to move when theres parkin on the other side I feel if the the main parking lot is full people with parking passes should be able to park on the other side was reserved for contractors it's never full ever full I had to wait almost 45 minutes in order to park it was full jam packed the main parking lot was and I asked front desk that I park in there since I have a room and she said no she would get in trouble as a reserved for a contractors which I understand that's her job rules are rules but guess should be able to car freely without having to wait up to an hour waiting for someone who doesn't even have a room to move, in housekeeping knocks at your door Way before Time repeatedly you tell frontis you have a 12:00 check out they still come and wake you up at 10:00 then 10:30 then at 11:00 and sometimes they threaten you telling you when check out is at 11:00 the insist that you get your stuff and leave but you have a late check out anything at 12:00 it needs to be better communication with housekeeping in front desk as far as chickens and check out and have a little roach problem also and where are the rooms the same size but different prices I understand double bed or King but a deluxe and Superior I don't see the difference I've stayed in both but other than that it's just fine I love it I will continue to stay there just a few amount of issues that can be worked out it will be perfect thank u

name: Comfort Inn Airport
description:
Located off Interstate 240, Comfort Inn Airport is less than 10 minutes’ drive from Graceland. This hotel offers a daily continental breakfast and free WiFi in all areas.
A flat-screen TV with cable is included in every traditional guest room of this Memphis hotel. Guests will also find a microwave and refrigerator in all rooms.
An airport transfer service is available and guests will also have access to laundry facilities. A fitness center can be found on site at Comfort Inn Airport.
The Memphis International Airport is 3 miles away from this hotel and the Memphis Zoo is 9 miles away. The University of Memphis is also 10 minutes’ drive from the hotel.

userReviews.title: It is definitely overpriced for what it is and where it is, but nice..
userReviews.positive:
It was a relatively short drive from where I needed to go. 
The hotel itself was very clean and comfortable, and I felt safe!
The room was very clean and very comfortable.  The bed was very nice!
userReviews.negative: The TV remote did not work, nor did the in room coffee maker.  There was no food at the hotel (hadn't eaten all day when I arrived) and would require a drive in unfamiliar area to go find some.  Apparently there were some microwavable sandwiches that could be purchased, but as someone gluten-free that would not work!  Most Comfort Inns have snacks that can be purchased, but not here. And this location is kind of not near anything itself except other hotels.   I don't know if there was breakfast served, but I did grab  tiny to-go coffee on my way out since the in-room coffee maker didn't work.  And getting in and out of the door from the parking area was a little treacherous considering there was a lot of ice that hadn't been cleared.

userReviews.title: No airport shuttle
userReviews.positive: Room was comfortable, staff were really helpful and friendly. Breakfast was good.
userReviews.negative: There is NO airport shuttle despite this being advertised on the booking.com page and on the hotel's website. For a 7 minute taxi ride, $25 from the airport and $27 back. No ride sharing app picked up the fare after 20 minutes of trying (it was 5:15am).

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Memphis - Airport
description:
This Extended Stay America - Memphis - Airport is located in Memphis and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Memphis is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities and upgraded bedding with extra pillows in every room.
The property offers free onsite parking. A grab-and-go breakfast is served every morning and includes bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea.
Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Gracel and, the Beale Street and the FedEx Forum.

name: La Quinta by Wyndham Memphis Airport Graceland
description:
This Tennessee hotel provides a free transport service to and from the Memphis International Airport, which is 2 miles away. Guests will enjoy free property-wide Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool, and daily hot breakfast.
A microwave, small refrigerator, and cable television are featured in all guest rooms. La Quinta Inn and Suites Memphis Airport Graceland provides coffee-making facilities as well.
Guests will have access to express check-out and local area transport service. This Memphis Airport La Quinta Inn and Suites also offers laundry facilities and free on-site parking.
The hotel is 3 miles from the Elvis Presley estate, Graceland, and 7 miles from The Liberty Bowl Memorial Stadium and Fairgrounds. The FedEx Forum is 10 miles away.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Memphis Airport
description:
This hotel is 4 miles from Memphis International Airport and Pine Hill Golf Course. It offers an outdoor pool and free airport shuttle service. Rooms have free Wi-Fi and Cable TV.
Courtyard Memphis Airport offers spacious rooms with luxury bedding. They are decorated with warm colors and have a cozy seating area with a hard wooden work desk. Facilities include iron and ironing board, tea/coffee maker and microwave/oven.
The hotel also has a fitness center that features cardiovascular equipment and free weights.
The Courtyard Bistro offers a breakfast buffet with a la carte items to start the day.
The Courtyard Memphis Airport is 4 miles away from Graceland and 6.2 miles from Liberty Bowl Stadium.

name: River Bluff Inn
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at River Bluff Inn! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Super 8 by Wyndham Memphis/Dwtn/Graceland Area is ideally located 10 minutes from downtown Memphis and Graceland, musician Elvis Presley’s historic home. It features an outdoor pool and free WiFi.
Rooms at Super 8 by Wyndham Memphis/Dwtn/Graceland Area are equipped with a coffee maker, cable TV including HBO and a hair dryer. A seating area is offered for added comfort.
Downtown Memphis Super 8 by Wyndham offers a gran and go breakfast every morning. A property shuttle offers transportation services to the airport and downtown Memphis area. Guests have free access to the gym and business center. Parking is available on site free of charge.
Memphis Cook Convention Center and FedExForum are a 10-minute drive from Super 8 by Wyndham Memphis/Dwtn/Graceland Area. The National Civil Rights Museum is only a 5-minute drive and the Memphis Zoo is 15 minutes away.

address.full: 340 West Illinois Avenue, Memphis, TN 38106, United States of America

name: The Memphian a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description:
Located within 3.5 miles of Brown Park and 3.8 miles of AutoZone Park, The Memphian a Tribute Portfolio Hotel provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Memphis. The property is around 3.8 miles from FedExForum, 3.8 miles from Fire Museum of Memphis and 3.9 miles from Stax Museum of American Soul Music. Private parking is available on site.
At the hotel, each room has a desk. Guest rooms in The Memphian a Tribute Portfolio Hotel are equipped with a TV and a hairdryer.
The accommodation offers an à la carte or American breakfast.
Orpheum Theater is 3.9 miles from The Memphian a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, while Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum is 4.1 miles away. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 7.5 miles from the hotel.

address.full: 21 South Cooper Street, Midtown, Memphis, 38104, United States of America

userReviews.title: The Memphian is worth every penny -- it's really nice without being hoity-toity.
userReviews.positive: The building is solid so didn't matter, being close to the (busy) road or the commercial area nearby. I really liked all the decor I saw, and the wall art, too. The accommodations were really fine, but better, the people working there were ALL friendly in a genuine way. Breakfast was great! They make GREAT bacon. We went to the rooftop bar one evening and it was obviously popular, but also very fun. I like that the request to wear masks generally in the hotel was (mostly) honored.
userReviews.negative: They didn't spell my first name right, which always is kinda a thing when it appears welcoming on your TV when you walk into the room. A detail, but...

userReviews.title: Weekend getaway was perfect.
userReviews.positive: I was a little surprised at the prices for breakfast until the plates arrived. Giant portions! Absolutely amazing food. In the end, I would gladly pay again for what we ate. Rooftop bar is a great place to grab a drink.

So, I asked her how to I book a table. Again, very rudely said "Open table". I just turned around and left out, She was very rude.. Other than that, the room we stayed in and the ambiance of the hotel was nice. Front desk staff was super amazing as well as housekeeping; super nice!

userReviews.title: Good potential for an excellent hotel but falls short.
userReviews.positive: We had a nice breakfast there.
userReviews.negative: Staff was non-responsive.  I left an air pod in the room when I checked out at 5am.  at 10 am I called from the airport to ask if they would look for it for me.  the operator said that he would tell the manager and she would get back to me about this.  No response.  the next week I called and talked again to he operator.  He again said that they would have the manager call me.  no response.  I called a third time and asked about my air pod and again the operator appolgize for my troubles and promised me that the manager would call me to tell me something about the air pod.  This time I did receive a call from the hotel but missed it.  They did not leave a message and when I called back within 10 minutes of the call the front desk said that they did not know who called me and asked around but no-one knew anything about the call.  No one ever called back.  I have given up.

name: Holiday Inn Express Memphis Medical Center - Midtown, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located just off Interstates 240 in midtown Memphis, this Holiday Inn Express features a daily hot breakfast buffet and outdoor pool. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel as well.
The Holiday Inn Express Memphis Medical Center – Midtown offers modern rooms equipped with a 32-inch flat-screen cable TV and in-room coffee maker. A work desk and ironing facilities are included.
An on-site fitness room and a business center are available at the Midtown Memphis Holiday Inn Express. Guests are welcome to enjoy the spacious pool deck as well.
The Holiday Inn Express Memphis Medical Center is 1.5 miles from Beale Street, 1 miles from St. Jude Research Hospital, and 2,650 feet from Southern College of Optometry. Memphis Zoo is less than 3 miles' drive.

name: Fairfield Inn and Suites Memphis Germantown
description:
This Fairfield Inn is 15 minutes' drive from Memphis International Airport.  Amenities include an indoor pool with hot tub, outdoor terrace and hot buffet breakfast. Rooms include free Wi-Fi.
Rooms at Fairfield Inn and Suites Germantown feature white linens and wood furniture.  Each includes an ergonomic work space, coffee maker and cable TV.
A fitness center is on site at Fairfield Inn and Suites Memphis. Guests have free access to the hotel’s whirlpool, and can relax with a free newspaper on the outdoor terrace.
The daily buffet breakfast includes pastries, hot waffles and fruit juice.  Free coffee is provided in the Fairfield Inn Memphis Germantown’s lobby.
Fairfield Inn and Suites Memphis is less than one mile from Highway 72, and 13 miles from Pink Palace Museum.  Parking at the hotel is free.

name: Residence Inn Memphis Germantown
description:
This hotel is 8-minute drive from Germantown and is 18 miles from Memphis. The hotel features suites with a fully equipped kitchen.
Residence Inn Memphis Germantown suites include a dining area and seating area. The kitchen includes a microwave and dishwasher. Guests can relax in front of the flat-screen TV or work with the free Wi-Fi.
Guests at the Residence Inn Memphis can work out in the gym or relax in the hot tub. The hotel also offers an outdoor pool.
Germantown Residence Inn provides guests with a breakfast buffet. The hotel also has a week night reception.
The Residence Inn is within 30-minute drive of Graceland, which is the museum and former home of Elvis Presley. The Memphis Zoo is 16 miles from the hotel.

description:
Located 15 miles from Elvis Presley's Graceland, Holiday Inn & Suites Memphis Southeast-Germantown, an IHG Hotel offers 3-star accommodations in Memphis and has a fitness center, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.
Guests at the hotel can enjoy an à la carte or an American breakfast.
Holiday Inn & Suites Memphis Southeast-Germantown, an IHG Hotel offers 3-star accommodations with an indoor pool.
Stax Museum of American Soul Music is 16 miles from the accommodation, while Brown Park is 17 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 11 miles from Holiday Inn & Suites Memphis Southeast-Germantown, an IHG Hotel.

userReviews.title: Great except for the breakfast.  I would select a different hotel the next trip.
userReviews.positive: The breakfast was not up to expectation.  Service was horrible.  There were 3 people involved a cook, a server and one that acted like a host? The breakfast was served from a menu.  You seated yourself. There people at 5 or 6  tables. None were eating. A couple tables had coffee. After 20 min a host visited us and took our order. We ordered the basic breakfast. 2 eggs scrambled with bacon and toast. About 15 or 20 min later a server came with one breakfast. Two people at the table myself with wife.  Another 15 min or so they came with the 2nd breakfast. No silver ware, no butter or jam with toast.  Other people in eating area were leaving not served.  The food quality was below average.  Basically if you are planning to use this restaurant do not plan on eating breakfast.  We were at the eating area around 9:30 am. I can't imagine what the service was like at the busy time.  The serving people were trying but just overwhelmed.  Maybe current travelers do no eat breakfast.
userReviews.negative: Standard and quality service in the restaurant

name: Home Inn and Suites Memphis
description:
Located in Memphis, within 14 miles of Elvis Presley's Graceland and 16 miles of Stax Museum of American Soul Music, Home Inn and Suites Memphis provides accommodations with a fitness center and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 2-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. FedExForum is 18 miles from the hotel and AutoZone Park is 18 miles away.
Selected rooms have a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave.
Brown Park is 17 miles from the hotel, while Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum is 18 miles away. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 11 miles from Home Inn and Suites Memphis.

name: Four Points Memphis Southwind
description:
This Memphis, Tennessee hotel features an indoor pool, on-site restaurant and bar, and free WiFi in all rooms and suites. Carriage Crossing shopping center is 5 mi away.
A cable TV, microwave, and small refrigerator are provided in every simply appointed Four Points Memphis Southwind room. A seating area with a sofa is also included.
A fitness center, business center, and shop with travel essentials are on site. This Memphis Four Points Southwind hotel offers free parking as well.
Located off Highway 385, this hotel is also 17 mi from Elvis Presley’s estate, Graceland. Memphis International Airport is 9.9 mi away.

userReviews.title: enjoyed our time in Memphis and would stay here again.
userReviews.positive: Great location, friendly staff. Cleaning team  did a good job. Rooms were comfortable and noise level was tolerable.  Kids loved the indoor pool even though it wasn't a heated pool.  Didn't try the in house restaurant but the food always smelled good if we were walking by during service hours.  Had 1 time that our key cards stopped working but the issue was quickly fixed .
userReviews.negative: Sofa bed was showing signs of age. Only had extra sheets for it. Would have been nice to have an extra blanket. We didn't ask for one so it may have been provided if asked for.  Fridge didn't have a freezer and microwave turn table seemed to not want to fit properly but they worked.  Might want to make sure the Keurig Coffee Maker is cleaned a little better.  Our first cup the water heated but never brewed. Took the pod holder out, ran water through it in the  bathroom sink and a good bit of "stuff" washed out of it.  Dumped the water out of the reservoir and realized it had stuff floating in it so rinsed that out as  well.  No more issues after a good cleaning.

userReviews.title: 2-day stay, double bed w/sofa for 3
userReviews.positive: The hotel is in a great location. It is right off the interstate, and  the exit before or after in either direction is great for shopping and eating. Additionally,  the hotel is on a great street. There are plenty of fast food locations to choose from, and again, you can always jump on the interstate  and go either up or down an exit to get to sit down dining.  The hotel was clean and quiet. The staff was very friendly and the room attendants were nice. There were no issues with getting additional towels and face cloths. The hotel also comes with an indoor pool. There is a lounge area in the lobby that is family-friendly. I and my two adult siblings shared  the double queen bedroom with a sofa. There was plenty of room for us and all our stuff. There was plenty of storage room in the closet to house our luggage, and the refrigerator was large enough to handle our Togo boxes from dinner.
userReviews.negative: There isn't much to say here.. Overall, the place is great. When coming back to Memphis, we will stay here again. Some of the things that we wish were better communicated was about breakfast. If you reserved the rooms through a third party, you have to show them your reservations that you paid for breakfast. Additionally. Regardless of how many people you tell them are staying in the room. It only covers up to 2 people. Each person gets a $10 daily breakfast credit. You do have to order off the breakfast menue and anything you order over your credit amount is billed. Nothing other than coffee is readily available. You will need to call in or go to the bar and put your order in. The menu is limited. Although we paid for the breakfast options, we ended up just going to breakfast while we were out. Be sure to pack your conditioners, shampoo, and soap. I have never seen such small bottles it definitely isn't enough for one person, let alone 3. However, the  Family Dollar is just a block over. It was not hard to just pick some up.

name: Hampton Inn Memphis-Southwind
description:
In the Southwind area of Memphis, Tennessee, this hotel is one mile from TPC Southwind. The hotel features an outdoor pool and rooms provide cable TV with pay-per-view movies.
Guests can use the free Wi-Fi available in every room at the Hampton Inn Memphis-Southwind. The rooms also include a coffee maker, ironing facilities and a hairdryer.
A gym is available at the Southwind Hampton Inn Memphis. The hotel offers breakfast, a 24-hour business center and a bar.
Memphis International Airport is 15 miles from the Hampton Inn Memphis. The Memphis Zoo is 16 miles away and the National Civil Rights Museum is 22 miles from the hotel.

name: Best Western Plus Galleria Inn & Suites
description:
This hotel is 19 mi from downtown Memphis and 25 mi from Graceland, the former home of Elvis Presley. The hotel offers area tours and rooms with a flat-screen TV.
Best Western Galleria Inn & Suites Memphis rooms include a microwave and refrigerator. The rooms are also equipped with a work desk and free WiFi.
Guests at the Best Western Plus Galleria Inn & Suites are provided with a daily breakfast. After breakfast guests can work out in the gym or work in the business center.
The Best Western Galleria Inn is less than a 5-minute drive from the Wolfchase Galleria, which offers shopping. The National Civil Rights Museum is 23 mi from the hotel.
Minimum age to reserve a room is 21 years old

name: La Quinta by Wyndham Memphis Wolfchase
description:
Within 3 miles of Colonial Country Club, this Tennessee hotel features a continental breakfast, free property-wide Wi-Fi, and indoor pool. Exotic animals are 8 miles away at the Memphis Zoo.
A flat-screen cable TV, microwave, and small refrigerator are included in all guest rooms.
When not burning a few calories in the fitness center, guests at La Quinta Inn and Suites Memphis Wolfchase can read emails in the business center. Laundry facilities and free parking are available for added convenience.
Guest can explore science and history 8 miles away at the The Pink Palace Museum and Planetarium. Mud Island, which is 10 miles away, offers a riverwalk and monorail with views of the Mississippi River.

address.full: 2839 New Brunswick Road, Memphis, TN 38133, United States of America

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Southwind - Hacks Cross
description:
Ideally situated in Memphis, Tennessee's Southwind Business District, this all-suite hotel offers spacious accommodations and services, such as a shuttle service within a 5 miles radius of the property.
Homewood Suites by Hilton Southwind - Hacks Cross features studios and suites with full kitchens and free high-speed internet access. Guests will also appreciate the 24-hour convenience store and on-site laundry facilities.
With services such as a free hot breakfast and reception on evenings Monday through Thursday, the Southwind Homewood Suites by Hilton ensures a comfortable stay. After working in the executive business center, guests can go for a swim in the pool or work out in the fitness room.

userReviews.positive: location, many stores around and convenient. Our AC was not working and our room was 81F. I called the front desk and Tim- AC person came to fix it right away even though He was supposed to leave for the day. i am grateful. Thank you!
userReviews.negative: the pool is dirty and the breakfast does not have many selections. i booked this hotel at last minute because our previous hotel was cancelled due to power outage. We came and checked in late at night and the front desk lady immediately told us that the hotel was sold out w/o checking our reservation. She told me she didn’t understand how i could successfully book. She scared the heck out of me, worrying where we were going to sleep after a long drive and 3 tired children. She was grumpy when i asked her to recheck. And finally she found our reservation. We got checked in but not with a welcoming gesture. Anyway, i am still happy we had a place to stay that night.

userReviews.title: Pleasant
userReviews.negative: The pictures are out dated.. We stayed for 3 nights. We arrived to our room & after about 30 mins of being checked in we realized the sink in the kitchenette was leaking so they sent someone up there. He looked at it & told us we needed to get out of room. Front desk called us & said it couldn’t be fixed today so they put us in a king room when I originally request 2 queen bed suite. She explained we would be back in our original from by tomorrow—- we were never once offered our originally room again. Not once didn’t anyone apologize for it. Friday around 3:30 am the fire alarm went off for 10 minute straight with no explanation, when we went downstairs to figure out what happened- the front desk lady came out and said “what are y’all standing around for, y’all can go back to bed, the alarm was tripped.” Her attitude was absolutely horrible & not once did she say sorry for any of it. Saturday came and the power was out for 2 hours. The breakfast is a joke for the amount of money you spend on the room. Blood stains on carpets. We called before arrival about pots & pans being in the room since we had kitchenettes & the lady told me yes ma’am, there’s a full set of both in each room— not true. There was one pot in each room we booked with lids that didn’t fit. I wasn’t 100% satisfied with my stay & felt like I could have found something better for cheaper than I paid.
userReviews.room: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds - Disability Access/Non-Smoking

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Memphis East Galleria
description:
This hotel features an indoor pool and spa, and Wi-Fi is free in all areas. It is 1 miles from Colonial Country Club and 0.6 miles from Wolfchase Shopping Mall.
All guest rooms at Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Memphis East Galleria feature air conditioning, satellite TV and an private bathroom. Rooms also have hot drink facilities, a hair dryer, an iron and an ironing board.
A hot buffet breakfast is served each morning in the Fairfield Inn’s dining area. There are also several cafés and restaurants within a few minutes’ walk of the hotel.
Guests can swim in the indoor pool. Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Memphis East Galleria is 16 miles from Memphis International Airport and 21 miles from Graceland.

name: Home2 Suites By Hilton Memphis Wolfchase Galleria
description:
Featuring 3-star accommodations, Home2 Suites By Hilton Memphis Wolfchase Galleria is located in Memphis, 18 miles from Fire Museum of Memphis and 18 miles from Brown Park. Featuring a fitness center, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel features family rooms.
All guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge.
Home2 Suites By Hilton Memphis Wolfchase Galleria offers a buffet or American breakfast.
The accommodation offers 3-star accommodations with an indoor pool.
Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge, a business center and laundry service at the property.
Stax Museum of American Soul Music is 18 miles from Home2 Suites By Hilton Memphis Wolfchase Galleria, while AutoZone Park is 19 miles away. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 19 miles from the hotel.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Memphis East Galleria
description:
Located in Memphis, 18 miles from Fire Museum of Memphis, Courtyard by Marriott Memphis East Galleria has accommodations with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness center and a bar. The property is around 18 miles from Brown Park, 18 miles from Stax Museum of American Soul Music and 19 miles from AutoZone Park. The property provides a 24-hour front desk and a business center for guests.
At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a closet. The private bathroom is equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms at Courtyard by Marriott Memphis East Galleria feature air conditioning and a desk.
À la carte and continental breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.
FedExForum is 19 miles from Courtyard by Marriott Memphis East Galleria, while Naval Support Activity Mid-South is 19 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 19 miles from the hotel.

name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Memphis East Galleria
description:
This hotel is within a 30-minute drive of downtown Memphis and one mile from the Wolfchase Galleria Mall. It provides free parking and a flat-screen TV in every room.
SpringHill Suites by Marriott Memphis East Galleria rooms include a microwave and refrigerator. Each room comes with free Wi-Fi and cable TV channels.
This Memphis East/Galleria hotel provides guests with a breakfast buffet and coffee and a convenience store. Guests can workout in the gym or swim in the indoor heated pool.
SpringHill Suites by Marriott Memphis East Galleria is within a 30-minute drive of Graceland. The hotel is 2 miles from Interstate 40.

userReviews.title: My stay at Springhill Suites was awesome!
userReviews.positive: I loved the location. I wanted to be within 30 minutes of tours and attractions. But did not want to stay in the hustle and bustle of Memphis. Springhill Suites was perfect for my getaway. With resturants galore and shopping nearby for those essentials that you forgot to pack, this hotel was very convenient. I stayed here about 9 years ago and will be back soon.
userReviews.negative: I really would have preferred having drawers for my clothing. I don't like "living out of a suitcase" while on vacation. Also, the first night the pool was awesome. The last couple of nights, it had an overwhelming smell of chlorine. and the water had a white looking substance that looked like soap floating in it.

userReviews.title: Would probably try one of the others next time
userReviews.positive: Location was good,  Front desk staff members were very friendly and accommodating, beds were comfy. I like that they close the entrance at 10 and you can only get in with a key, so random people can't come in.
userReviews.negative: Room was close to the pool so it was always humid. Refrigerator was so cold it froze everything and no way to turn it down.  There is one drawer so you have to hang up or keep stuff in your suitcase. The sofa was dirty. If you have a sofabed you should probably leave sheets and blankets in the rooms. 2 towels to begin with it not enough. Had to ask the desk for all these items. Could've been cleaner also! I love having a ceiling fan, but keep the thing clean! Ours was not. The breakfast was ok. No waffle maker, no toaster. Provided bagged bagels but no way to toast. And no sliced bread at all. The 10 kids in the pool were quite rowdy and loud. I could hear them from down the hall. The lighting in the bathroom is too dark. No light over the shower and it was just dark.

userReviews.negative: Distance from Downtown area.

userReviews.title: Getaway to Memphis the home of BBQ Meats and Fried Sweets was better with Springhill Suites
userReviews.positive: This hotel is located in a " Hospitality Row" type area with many different places available. It was very safe and quiet. It was right next to a mall and other local shopping if you needed something ( Walmart and Sam's club) and several places to eat. The staff was professional and courteous and above board on safety precautions for COVID-19. The room was very spacious with a desk area, fridge and microwave that also had a sink as well ( mini bar type set up). The bed's were comfortable and "sitting room" area was also roomy. Heather recommended great bbq in town! The bathroom area was well lit. The additional ceiling fan to circulate air through the room was a great bonus for comfort when it is muggy. They served a grab and go breakfast and offered fruit and dry cereal, and oatmeal. We stayed for 2 days
userReviews.negative: The couch was not a traditional pull out , but a trundle and the mattress was spotted and dirty. The bathroom area counter space was small and the lighting in the room was a bit dim. The elevator was very small, and could only fit maybe 4 adults with no luggage in it. The pool is very small in comparison to other hotel pools, there was 4 of us in the pool at a time, and it was just enough room for us to enjoy.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis-Wolfchase Galleria
description:
This hotel is located in the Memphis suburb of Bartlett, across from the Woflchase Galleria mall. The completely nonsmoking hotel offers an outdoor pool, hot daily breakfast and free Wi-Fi.
Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis-Wolfchase Galleria features cable TV and a coffee maker in every guest room. A hair dryer and work desk are also provided.
Guests at the Memphis Hampton Inn can use the gym or the laundry facilities. A business center with copy and fax services is also available.
Downtown Memphis is within a 30-minute drive of the Hampton Inn Wolfchase Galleria. Saint Francis Hospital-Bartlett is less than one mile away.

name: Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Memphis-Wolfchase Galleria, an IHG Hotel
description:
This completely nonsmoking Memphis, Tennessee hotel offers spacious guestrooms with free wireless internet access and is located near Interstate 40 and the city center.
Start the day at the Holiday Inn Memphis-Wolfchase Galleria with an energizing workout in the 24-hour fitness center or enjoy a cup of coffee from in-room coffeemakers. Take advantage of the indoor swimming pool or enjoy our breakfast options.
The Memphis Zoo, the National Civil Rights Museum and Graceland, former home of Elvis Presley are within driving distance of the Memphis-Wolfchase Galleria Holiday Inn. A number of shopping centers and restaurants are also nearby.

name: Microtel Inn and Suites by Wyndham - Cordova
description:
This Cordova, Tennessee hotel is located off Interstate 40 and features a daily continental breakfast. Free Wi-Fi is included in every room. Wolfchase Galleria is 14 minutes’ walk away.
A cable TV and coffee machine are featured in all rooms at this Cordova Microtel Inn and Suites by Wyndham. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower.
Free parking is provided at this pet-friendly Microtel Inn and Suites by Wyndham Cordova as well. Laundry facilities and vending machines are available at an additional cost.
The Memphis International Airport is 21 miles away. Guests will also be 5 miles from Agricenter Farmers Market and 20 miles from Memphis city center.

description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Wolfchase-Memphis, TN! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

A fitness center is available for guest use at this Country Inn & Suites. A business center and conference/meeting facilities are also featured.
The Memphis Zoo and Mud Island River Park are within 15 mi of the Country Inn & Suites By Carlson. Memphis city center is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hyatt Place Memphis Wolfchase
description:
Offering an outdoor pool and a fitness center, Hyatt Place Memphis Wolfchase is located 10 minutes' walk from Wolfchase Galleria Mall. Free WiFi is provided.
Rooms at this Memphis hotel come standard with air conditioning and a seating area. There is also a small refrigerator. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Extras include a sofa, a desk, and bed linen.
A business center and meeting/banquet facilities are available at Memphis Wolfchase Hyatt Place. Other facilities include luggage storage and a 24-hour front desk. Free parking is offered to guests.
Enjoy a beer, cocktail, or coffee at the onsite Bakery Café. The 24/7 Gallery Menu offers flatbreads, salads and burgers.
The hotel is less than 30 minutes' drive from Beale Street and Graceland. Memphis International Airport is 20 mi from the property.

address.full: 7905 Giacosa Place, Memphis, TN 38133, United States of America

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Memphis - Cordova
description:
This Extended Stay America - Memphis - Cordova is located in Memphis and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Memphis is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities and upgraded bedding with extra pillows in every room.
A grab-and-go breakfast is served every morning and includes bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea.
The property offers free onsite parking and free local phone calls. Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Shelby Farms, the FedEx Forum and the Graceland.

description:
This Extended Stay America - Memphis - Wolfchase Galleria is located in Memphis and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Memphis is equipped with a stove top, microwave and a refrigerator. The hotel also provides guests an iron and ironing board and upgraded bedding with extra pillows in every room.
A grab-and-go breakfast is served every morning and includes bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea. Laundry facilities are available.
The property offers free onsite parking. Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Wolfchase Galleria Mall, the Graceland and the Memphis Zoo.

userReviews.positive: Staff was friendly and took care of us in a timely manner. When we arrived we were exhausted - so were mostly just looking for a decent room to fall asleep. Bed was comfortable enough, room was conditioned - so met our basic needs.
userReviews.negative:
The above is about all it did- make basic needs. The room looked like it had not been renovated since the 70s, had a weird vanity -felt it was only 2ft high- was really low for someone 6'3".  In the morning coffee was lukewarm and ran out before getting a cup for both of us, so we had to go to Starbucks for a decent cup of coffee. In addition during the night someone appeared to be arrested outside my friend's room, and there was a knocking on my window about 2am, making us feel wary about our location. We could not wait to get out of there and back on the road. Even my dog seemed uncomfortable in the room, not sure why- she just seemed to sense something - she was raring to go in the am.
Basically i felt the rate was too high for what we got. It felt more like a $70/night stay vs $130
userReviews.room: Deluxe Studio with 1 Queen Bed - Non-Smoking

userReviews.title: OK FOR THE PRICE
userReviews.positive: For the price it was ok. Christopher was there when we checked in after 9pm. He was very friendly and informative on things to do in the area. However Iris the manager was not as nice the next morning when I went down to pay for an extra day. She became very short when I asked about the pool being closed and just wanted to see if i could sit outside to get some fresh air. In a very rude manner she said "If it's closed it's closed." For someone in a management position her customer service skills need work. Kristin was on duty later that night and was just as nice and kind as Christopher. She was very sympathetic  that we had very late evening departure flight the next day.  She did go over the options  of staying  a bit longer. Upon checking out the next day Christopher also gave the option to do a late check out which would have been an additional 10.00 for an hour because the manager only allows a guest to stay until noon, anything beyond that you have to pay for an entire day.  Christopher  and Kristin were wonderful and in my opinion should be in management positions.
userReviews.negative: Lack of customer service by Iris the manager. The pool was not open on July 4th weekend. No place to sit other than inside.

name: Comfort Suites Cordova
description:
Conveniently set in the Cordova district of Memphis, Comfort Suites Cordova is located 17 miles from Fire Museum of Memphis, 17 miles from Brown Park and 17 miles from Stax Museum of American Soul Music. The property is around 17 miles from AutoZone Park, 17 miles from FedExForum and 18 miles from Orpheum Theater. The property provides a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property.
Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.
Memphis Rock ‘n’ Soul Museum is 18 miles from Comfort Suites Cordova, while Naval Support Activity Mid-South is 19 miles away. The nearest airport is Memphis International Airport, 17 miles from the accommodation.
